about.title: About Mugixor
about.subtitle: We are pioneers in sustainable mobility, connecting Europe with innovative and ecological transport solutions
about.storyText1: From our local roots to our global vision, Mugixor is dedicated to revolutionizing the way people move through European cities. Founded with the mission to make urban mobility more accessible, efficient and environmentally friendly.
about.storyText2: We offer a wide range of electric vehicles that combine advanced technology, elegant design and environmental sustainability for students, professionals and workers in more than 900 European cities.
about.missionText: Transform European urban mobility through innovative, accessible and sustainable electric solutions that improve the quality of life of our users.
about.visionText: To be the leading electric mobility company in Europe, creating a future where urban transport is 100% sustainable and efficient.
about.valuesText: Innovation, sustainability, quality and commitment to our customers. Each product reflects our dedication to excellence.
about.sustainabilityText: All our products are 100% electric, contributing to a cleaner and more sustainable future.
about.technologyText: We incorporate the latest innovations in electric mobility to offer the best experience.
about.qualityText: We offer high quality products with extended warranties and complete technical support.
about.serviceText: Our team is available 24/7 to provide you with the best service and advice.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help. Contact us by any means
